website_summaries.verdict: Offers great performance and durability, but if features are important to you, we recommend exploring other options.
pros: Features a glass panel that covers the fire area and is designed to protect it and make it easier to keep clean
cons: The remote can only be used to turn the unit on and off
All other adjustments have to be made manually

customer_reviews.title: Motor burned out in less than a year! Dimplex would not support the product!
customer_reviews.text: The fireplace worked fine for 10 months, then the motor assembly burnt out. First it started making noise and burned out a couple of days after. I spent hours on hold with Dimplex with the final result being: The two replacement motors they sent (without directions of any kind) were not the part I needed. I could tell just by looking at them. I tried one anyway, but the wiring is completely different. Apparently this is a discontinued model that I purchased. The rep said they don't make the part anymore so I'm out of luck, try to get Amazon to do something.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Perry

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: We are so happy with this purchase! It was packaged very carefully, and it did not have any damage. It was very easy to put together! And it does put out some heat. It's not going to heat a large room on its own, but it does add heat to the room for sure. And the flames look really nice! This purchase was well worth it!!
customer_reviews.author: happyface

customer_reviews.title: Great Electric Fireplace!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to include a short video to show how great the "flames" look. We absolutely love this fireplace. We have about a 700sq foot basement and this unit definitely takes the chill out of the air. We have owned this unit for 5 months. Pros: #1 - Great Price & FREE shipping with Prime! (This purchase alone makes prime worth the subscription) #2 - The unit is absolutely beautiful with great realistic flames #3 - Extremely easy to assemble. Assembly took less than half an hour with 1 person #4 - Gives off enough heat to warm up a small area or just enough to take the chill off a large one Cons: None
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: This is Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Great buy. It looks beautiful and elegant. It was the perfect addition to our home. It even gives off great heat.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Fireplace
customer_reviews.text: The fireplace was packaged with care and quite easy to assemble (No Tools Required!) and took less than ten minutes to put together. The powder coated black firebox was packaged separately from all wood components in a single large box. The flame is realistic and the heat blower is extremely quiet--this product is a great choice for a bedroom or reading room. The wood frame is color rich and well built. Overall, this is a very nice fireplace.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Electric Fireplace
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with my Dimplex DFP4765BW. It arrived on schedule and in good shape, was easy to assemble and works just fine. It looks very nice in my small living room..
customer_reviews.author: Lee Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Need better quality control
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two and had to return both due to nicks/damage not caused by shipping. Not trying for a third time due the work involved in returning a large item. Amazon is good to work with, however.
customer_reviews.author: Kiahlee

customer_reviews.title: Great fireplace!
customer_reviews.text: This unit was purchased to warm a living-room about 15' x 20' with standard 8' ceiling. The previous fan-forced electric heat source was extremely noisy and obtrusive, making it nearly impossible to hold a comfortable conversation. We have used the new fireplace for about 3 weeks now. The Dimplex Fireplace warms the room quickly and efficiently and quietly, and maintains a constant pleasant temperature with no annoying background noise. It also offers a life-like fireplace experience. It is a beautiful piece of furniture, not just a great heater! I recommend this to anyone who needs a quiet heat source. It comes well-packed, it is easy to assemble. 5 stars all the way!
customer_reviews.author: gamma_ray

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING!!! Had this for over three years with no issues (the only reason we got rid of it was because we moved and did not have need of it). Has amazing heat output and was safe to have around kids and pets. Also, it is as lovely as the photo depicts.
customer_reviews.author: JNJ

customer_reviews.title: The case is awesome and the heater inside it worked one year
customer_reviews.text: The case is awesome and the heater inside it worked one year. We took the heater out and ordered the small heater that would fit in the hole...actually it is smaller than the hole but it looks nice. WE love it.
customer_reviews.author: Foothills

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This Electric Fireplace is beautiful. We have it in our dining room. It matches the rest of our dark furniture perfectly. I have several Dimplex fireplaces and inserts in my home. The fire features are very realistic.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Picture Doesn't Do Justice!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for our living room, but I was scare it was going to be a bit smaller than what I wanted. The product is amazing for the price. Easy to install, good quality and I am very pleased with it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: D. Valdez

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely  Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This fireplace was packaged very carefully, with no damage. I was originally a little concerned about the price, but it appeared to be very nice on the internet. When we received it......it was MUCH NICER than expected. The flames are VERY realistic & it easily heats our small living room & dining room. And, an additional nice feature is the blower is VERY quiet. You pay a little more for a Dimplex, but you really get what you pay for. Highly recommond this product!
customer_reviews.author: kaibabsquirrel

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Very realistic looking fire.. The heater will warm our downstairs... Love it
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Was so excited to get this, and then it showed up damaged.
customer_reviews.author: megan

customer_reviews.title: Warm and inviting
customer_reviews.text: I bought this fireplace for my son and his wife for Christmas. It arrived quickly, and it was easy to set up. They enjoy it for the warmth, the realistic flame, and the beauty of the wood. They have had the fireplace since Christmas, and they love it. It is much prettier than the picture, and it heats their large room better than they thought it would. They also love the fact that they can use the large mantle for decorative items (it was great for the Christmas stockings). Well worth the price....
customer_reviews.author: smokey

customer_reviews.title: Nice Fireplace
customer_reviews.text: RECEIVED FIREPLACE WITHIN A WEEK .IT WAS VERY VERY EASY TO ASSEMBLE AND LOOKS VERY NICE IN OUR ROOM.WE LIVE IN FLORIDA SO HAVE NOT TRIED IT OUT OTHER THAN A TEST TO SEE IF IT WORK AND HOW IT LOOKED (GREAT). HAVE HAD VERY GOOD LUCK WITH PURCHASES THROUGH AMAZON, Have now used fireplace several times during cold nights and works very well with plenty of heat for our enclosed porch.
customer_reviews.author: george

customer_reviews.title: Great fireplace, very realistic
customer_reviews.text: Great fireplace, very realistic. The half moon that others mentioned did not bother me at all- I hardly even notice it. The height of the fireplace is good- able to hang stockings on it without obstructing the view of the fire. Mantle is made from good, quality wood. I highly recommend this fireplace!
customer_reviews.author: christine

customer_reviews.title: Love this fireplace!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Our fireplace was delivered today. UPS wheeled it right into the living room. It took my husband 20 minutes to assemble. He did not need any tools because the screws had attached wing nuts for easy tightening. Also attached Dow pins for lining up purposes. Amazingly easy to assemble. Yes there is a dome shape on firewall that just adds character. If I could fit one into another room I would buy it in a second. It took longer to unpack (because of excellent packaging) than it took to assemble. Perfect condition. No scratches. No scrapes. Just waiting for Nite to try out this beauty.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie B.

product_meta.title: Dimplex Holbrook DFP4765BW Traditional Electric Fireplace Mantle with 23-Inch Firebox, Burnished Walnut
product_meta.description: This Dimplex electric fireplace is designed in a traditional style, with an elegant look. It comes in a very attractive burnished walnut finish and a 2-inch black trim, which will brighten up any room. It comes with a 23-Inch firebox and an on/off remote control. It is easy to assemble. It can be used with or without heat and comes with an on/off remote control. This mantel provides a timeless focal point to any room. On-demand heat with thermostat control warms a room or area of up to 400-feet. Dimplex invented the modern electric fireplace and continues to lead the way with exclusive technologies that dazzle the eye. The patented 3d effect gives the fire its depth and dancing flames- something you only find on Dimplex electric fireplaces. When you buy Dimplex, you know you're getting the original and the best. Dimplex electric fireplaces deliver warmth and ambiance while reducing environmental impact. Dimplex electric fireplaces use 90-Percent less energy than gas fireplaces to produce visual flames. No combustion means no greenhouse gasses.
feature_bullets: Beautiful traditional design with a burnished walnut finish
On-demand heat with thermostat control warms a room or area of up to 400 sq feet
23-Inch self-trimmed electric firebox flame operates with or without heat

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.2 out of 5 stars28 ratings3.2 out of 5 stars
